attachments.title: External Julia REPL in VSCode
attachments.text: Someone recently asked in Slack if it was possible to to launch the Julia REPL process in a separate window (i.e. a separate terminal) and have that hooked up with the Julia extension such that you can send code to it from the editor. This can be pretty useful, for example, if you have a second monitor where you want to keep the REPL and thus make it possible to maximize the editor window on the first monitor.
